channel.title: Proanthocyanidin on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Proanthocyanidin on funPlantGenes

item.title: BnTT16.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnTT16.1 Gene Name: TRANSPARENT TESTA 16 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Brassica napus TT16 homologs with different genomic origins and expression levels encode proteins that regulate a broad range of endothelium-associated genes at the transcriptional level.

item.title: BnTT16.2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnTT16.2 Gene Name: TRANSPARENT TESTA 16 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Brassica napus TT16 homologs with different genomic origins and expression levels encode proteins that regulate a broad range of endothelium-associated genes at the transcriptional level.

item.title: BnTT16.3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnTT16.3 Gene Name: TRANSPARENT TESTA 16 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Brassica napus TT16 homologs with different genomic origins and expression levels encode proteins that regulate a broad range of endothelium-associated genes at the transcriptional level.

item.title: BnTT16.4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnTT16.4 Gene Name: TRANSPARENT TESTA 16 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Brassica napus TT16 homologs with different genomic origins and expression levels encode proteins that regulate a broad range of endothelium-associated genes at the transcriptional level.

item.title: CsMYB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsMYB2 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 2 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Two MYB transcription factors (CsMYB2 and CsMYB26) are involved in flavonoid biosynthesis in tea plant.

item.title: CsPH4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs9g03070 Gene Symbol: CsPH4 Gene Name: Proanthocyanidin4 Genome: Citrus sinensis Valencia genome v1.

item.title: DkbZIP5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DkbZIP5 Gene Name: putative basic leucine-zipper transcription factor5 Genome: Species: Diospyros kaki Functional Descriptions: Seasonal Abscisic Acid Signal and a Basic Leucine Zipper Transcription Factor, DkbZIP5, Regulate Proanthocyanidin Biosynthesis in Persimmon Fruit.

item.title: DkMYB14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DkMYB14 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Diospyros kaki Functional Descriptions: DkMYB14 is a bifunctional transcription factor that regulates the accumulation of proanthocyanidin in persimmon fruit.

item.title: DkMyb2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DkMyb2 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor2 Genome: Species: Diospyros kaki Functional Descriptions: DkMyb2 wound-induced transcription factor of persimmon (Diospyros kaki Thunb.

item.title: DkMyb4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DkMyb4 Gene Name: Myb transcription factor4 Genome: Species: Diospyros kaki Functional Descriptions: DkMyb4 Is a Myb Transcription Factor Involved in Proanthocyanidin Biosynthesis in Persimmon Fruit.

item.title: FaMYB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaMYB1 Gene Name: transcription factor MYB1 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: The strawberry transcription factor FaMYB1 inhibits the biosynthesis of proanthocyanidins in Lotus corniculatus leaves.

item.title: MdERF1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdERF1B Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The ethylene response factor MdERF1B regulates anthocyanin and proanthocyanidin biosynthesis in apple.

item.title: MdJAZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000452772 Gene Symbol: MdJAZ1 Gene Name: jasmonate-ZIM domain (JAZ) protein 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The jasmonate-ZIM domain (JAZ) proteins MdJAZ1 and MdJAZ2 negatively modulate MdABI4-improved cold tolerance in apple by interacting with the MdABI4 protein.

item.title: MdJAZ18
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000757701 Gene Symbol: MdJAZ18 Gene Name: jasmonate ZIM-domain protein 18 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdSnRK1.

item.title: MdMYB23
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000230141 Gene Symbol: MdMYB23 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 23 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: R2R3-MYB transcription factor MdMYB23 is involved in the cold tolerance and proanthocyanidin accumulation in apple.

item.title: MdMYBPA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMYBPA1 Gene Name: PA1-type MYB transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The proanthocyanidin-specific transcription factor MdMYBPA1 initiates anthocyanin synthesis under low-temperature conditions in red-fleshed apples.

item.title: MdSnRK1.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000191788 Gene Symbol: MdSnRK1.1 Gene Name: SNF1-related protein kinase 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: An Apple Protein Kinase MdSnRK1.

item.title: MdTRB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000258862 Gene Symbol: MdTRB1 Gene Name: telomere-binding protein Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: A series of biological assays showed that MdTRB1 acted as a positive modulator of anthocyanin and proanthocyanidin accumulation, and is dependent on MdMYB9.

item.title: Noemi
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs5g31400 Gene Symbol: Noemi Gene Name: bHLH protein Genome: Citrus sinensis Valencia genome v1.

item.title: NtbHLH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtbHLH1 Gene Name: basic helix-loop-helix 1 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtbHLH1, a JAF13-like bHLH, interacts with NtMYB6 to enhance proanthocyanidin accumulation in Chinese Narcissus.

item.title: PbMYB10b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbMYB10b Gene Name: MYB10b transcription factor Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: Among these MYB-like genes, the specific functions of two novel MYB TFs, designated as PbMYB10b and PbMYB9, were further verified by both overexpression and RNAi transient assays.

item.title: PbMYB9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbMYB9 Gene Name: MYB9 transcription factor Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: Among these MYB-like genes, the specific functions of two novel MYB TFs, designated as PbMYB10b and PbMYB9, were further verified by both overexpression and RNAi transient assays.

item.title: SlAN11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlAN11 Gene Name: TRANSPARENT TESTA GLABRA 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Tomato SlAN11 regulates flavonoid biosynthesis and seed dormancy by interaction with bHLH proteins but not with MYB proteins.

item.title: VvLAR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvLAR1 Gene Name: leucoanthocyanidin reductase 1 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: VvLAR1 and VvLAR2 Are Bifunctional Enzymes for Proanthocyanidin Biosynthesis in Grapevine.

item.title: VvLAR2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvLAR2 Gene Name: leucoanthocyanidin reductase 2 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: VvLAR1 and VvLAR2 Are Bifunctional Enzymes for Proanthocyanidin Biosynthesis in Grapevine.

item.title: VvMYB14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_207s0005g03340 Gene Symbol: VvMYB14 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 14 Genome: V.

item.title: VvMybPA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvMybPA1 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor PA1 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: A previous study has already identified VvMybPA1 as the first transcription factor involved in the regulation of the proanthocyanidin pathway during seed development in grapevine.

item.title: VvMybPA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvMybPA2 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor PA2 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: Ectopic Expression of VvMybPA2 Promotes Proanthocyanidin Biosynthesis in Grapevine and Suggests Additional Targets in the Pathway.

item.title: VvPUB26
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_03s0063g00180 Gene Symbol: VvPUB26 Gene Name: U-box domain-containing protein 26 Genome: grape genome database Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: Ubiquitin ligase VvPUB26 in grapevine promotes proanthocyanidin synthesis and resistance to powdery mildew.
